exceptions.tactic: apply comp_mono with (T1 := prod_poset T1 T2) (T2 := T1) (T3 := T2) (f1 := fst) (f2 := snd); intros x y H; destruct x as [x1 x2]; destruct y as [y1 y2]; simpl in *; auto.

original: apply comp_mono with (T1 := prod_poset T1 T2) (T2 := T1) (T3 := T2) (f1 := fst) (f2 := snd); intros x y H; destruct x as [x1 x2]; destruct y as [y1 y2]; simpl in *; auto. apply snd.
